sandy.materials.videoex.VideoRtmpSource

type
class
extends
VideoUriSource
defined in
sandy.materials.videoex.VideoSource
version
3.2
since
3.2
An rtmp server video source.

Static Variables

LIVE_ONLY(inline,null) : Float

Will only connect to an existing live stream

LIVE_OR_RECORDED(inline,null) : Float

Connect to live stream, if it exists, then tries recorded stream

RECORDED(inline,null) : Float

Connect to a recorded stream at 0.0 seconds

Constructor

new()
parameters
uri Full rtmp uri
volume Playback volume, 0-1. Defaults to 1.0 (full volume)
start Playback start time in stream. Defaults to 0 (beginning of recorded stream)
useAmf3 Sets whether to use AMF0 (false), AMF3(true) or VideoSource.DEFAULT_USE_AMF3 (null)
Creates an rtmp video source. Refer to NetStream.play() for documentation regarding the start parameter.
